properties.description: Tis pipeline will copy data from csv files and insert it into respective azure table.

activities.name: Lookup Get Table list
activities.description: This Activity will fetch all the table name which needs to be copied to azure SQL

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from ADFTableList where IsActive=1
and SourceSystemName='ADLS' and DestSystemName='AzureSQLArchivalDB' 
and DestTableName not in ('INSTALLATION_COMMENTS','MKT_ANALYSIS_BY_REASON')

activities.name: Copy data csv to azure  sql db

dependsOn.activity: Copy data csv to azure  sql db

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'ADLS' as Source,
'Azure SQL' as Destination,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy data csv to azure  sql db').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time

dependsOn.activity: Copy data csv to azure  sql db

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
